alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 9:35PM MDT until March 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County and South Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains
